title: Top 10 Optimistic, Feel-Good, Awe-Inspiring News Stories

stories.title: Ocean Cleanup Project Removes Record Plastic
stories.summary: The Ocean Cleanup project removed 100,000 pounds of plastic from the Great Pacific Garbage Patch, marking their most successful cleanup yet.

stories.title: Students Design Solution for Water Crisis
stories.summary: High school students in Kenya invented a low-cost water purification system that could help millions access clean drinking water.

stories.title: Mental Health Support Expands Globally
stories.summary: New mental health support programs launched in 50 countries, providing free counseling and support to those who need it most.

stories.title: Renewable Energy Milestone Achieved
stories.summary: Wind and solar power now generate 40% of the worlds electricity, marking a historic shift toward sustainable energy.

stories.title: Acts of Kindness Go Viral
stories.summary: A simple act of kindness by a grocery store worker sparked a global movement of people helping strangers, restoring faith in humanity.
